h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: The first bell can be found in the Forest of Wolves. Start from the **Keeper's Shrine at Outside the Forest** and head straight up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 1'.
The content is as follows:
The first bell can be found in the Forest of Wolves. Start from the **Keeper's Shrine at Outside the Forest** and head straight up.
